data.text: @sally_chamness Hello. Please be assured that your details have been forwarded to the relevant team and they will be in touch as soon as possible. The team are very busy at this time, however please rest assured they will reply. Thank you for your patience. ^Tom

urls.title: Contact us | Virgin Atlantic help centre
urls.description: If you have any questions, concerns or issues, we're here to help. Check here to find the answers to your questions here and get in touch with us if you need to.

data.text:
@phil_wareing Hello, I'm sorry to hear your booking has been cancelled. If you have booked with Virgin Atlantic directly then please call us on the number at the following link: https://t.co/oaPDeS1Bxt 
If you have booked with Virgin Holidays, please contact them directly. ^Tom
